title: 145 What Mindfulness and Daydreaming Have to Do with Getting Things Done with David Allen
description:
"Decide outcomes and actions when things show up instead of when they blow up." - David Allen
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes and more at www.lewishowes.com/145.
